title: IAA Tonight | Raiders WR Davante Adams Charged with Misdemeanor Assault for MNF Shove
description: LeSean McCoy, Adam Pacman Jones and Leger Douzable discuss the latest news on Raiders WR Davante Adams now facing charges after pushing a photographer following their Monday Night Football loss to the Chiefs. Plus, Kenny Pickett is now the starter in Pittsburgh, but is he being setup for failure?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, LeSean McCoy, Adam Pacman Jones)
